WorkItem.Description: I am looking for a simple sample, with which I can learn how to interact (CRUD) with a MS-SQL-Database, using entity framework as DAL, a c# class library as business layer and a WPF application as GUI. Especially in the gui I want to fill a datta grid. In taht data grid I would like to learn how to present exisitng data in the database, manage updates and deletes. DBContext would be preferred
